00024 #ifndef GERBV_SCREEN_H
00025 #define GERBV_SCREEN_H
00026 
00027 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00028 #include <config.h>
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #include <gtk/gtk.h>
00032 #include <gdk/gdk.h>
00033 
00034 #include "gerb_image.h"
00035 
00036 #define INITIAL_SCALE 200
00037 #define MAX_ERRMSGLEN 25
00038 #define MAX_COORDLEN 28
00039 #define MAX_DISTLEN 45
00040 #define MAX_STATUSMSGLEN (MAX_ERRMSGLEN+MAX_COORDLEN+MAX_DISTLEN)
00041 
00042 /* Macros to convert between unscaled gerber coordinates and other units */
00043 /* XXX NOTE: Currently unscaled units are assumed as inch, this is not
00044    XXX necessarily true for all files */
00045 #define COORD2MILS(c) ((c)*1000.0)
00046 #define COORD2MMS(c) ((c)*25.4)
00047 
00048 typedef enum {NORMAL, MOVE, ZOOM_OUTLINE, MEASURE, ALT_PRESSED} gerbv_state_t;
00049 
00050 typedef enum {GERBV_MILS, GERBV_MMS} gerbv_unit_t;
00051 
00052 typedef struct {
00053     gerb_image_t *image;
00054     GdkColor *color;
00055     char *name;
00056     char *basename;
00057     char inverted;
00058 } gerbv_fileinfo_t;
00059 
00060 typedef struct {
00061        double x1, y1;
00062        double x2, y2;
00063 } gerbv_bbox_t;
00064 
00065 
00066 typedef struct {
00067     GtkWidget *drawing_area;
00068     GdkPixmap *pixmap;
00069     GdkColor  *background;
00070     GdkFunction si_func; /* Function used for superimposing layers */
00071     GdkColor  *zoom_outline_color;
00072     GdkColor  *dist_measure_color;
00073     gerbv_unit_t unit;
00074 
00075     struct {
00076        GtkWidget *load_file;
00077        GtkWidget *color_selection;
00078        GtkWidget *export_png;
00079        GtkWidget *scale;
00080        GtkWidget *log;
00081        GtkWidget *project;
00082     } win;
00083 
00084     gerbv_fileinfo_t *file[MAX_FILES];
00085     int curr_index;
00086     char *path;
00087     char *execpath;    /* Path to executed version of gerbv */
00088     char *project;     /* Current project to simplify save next time */
00089     
00090     /* Bounding box for all loaded gerber images. Initialized by autoscale() */
00091     gerbv_bbox_t gerber_bbox;
00092 
00093     GtkTooltips *tooltips;
00094     GtkWidget *layer_button[MAX_FILES];
00095     GtkWidget *popup_menu;
00096     struct {
00097        GtkWidget *msg;
00098        char msgstr[MAX_ERRMSGLEN];
00099        char coordstr[MAX_COORDLEN];
00100        char diststr[MAX_DISTLEN];
00101     } statusbar;
00102 
00103     gerbv_state_t state;
00104     gboolean centered_outline_zoom;
00105 
00106  //   int scale;
00107 
00108     int selected_layer;         /* Selected layer by Alt+keypad */
00109 
00110     gint last_x;
00111     gint last_y;
00112     gint start_x;           /* Zoom box/measure start coordinates */
00113     gint start_y;
00114 
00115     int trans_x; /* Translate offset */
00116     int trans_y;
00117     gerb_transf_t *transf; /*handles all tranformations:Mirroring, scaling and translation*/
00118 
00119     gint off_x;                    /* Offset current pixmap when panning */
00120     gint off_y;
00121     gerbv_bbox_t clip_bbox; /* Clipping bounding box */
00122 
00123     int dump_parsed_image;
00124 } gerbv_screen_t;
00125 
00126 extern gerbv_screen_t screen;
00127 
00128 #endif /* GERBV_SCREEN_H */
